channel.title: Classical drama
channel.description:
This series presents full-length productions of Greek and Roman plays of antiquity in modern English translation with original music especially composed for this series. Each play is introduced by William Arrowsmith, University of Texas.,This series presents full-length productions of Greek and Roman plays of antiquity in modern English translation with original music especially composed for this series. Each play is introduced by William Arrowsmith of the University of Texas.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Philoctetes, part 1
item.description: This program presents part one of Philoctetes by Sophocles, in a translation by David Grene. The introduction is by Professor Gerald Else, University of Michigan.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Theater & Drama

item.title: The birds, part 3
item.description: This program presents part 3 of The Birds by Aristophanes, in a new translation by William Arrowsmith.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Theater & Drama

item.title: Seven against Thebes
item.description: This program presents part one of Seven Against Thebes by Aeschylus. The introduction is by Professor Gerald Else, University of Michigan.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Theater & Drama

item.description: This program presents part one of The Brothers by Terence, in a translation by Lionel Casson.
